resources.string: Enter latitude and longitude in the text fields and click on the button to see the sunrise and sunset time

To begin using the Music Library App, start by browsing through its collection of songBeans. You can select any songBeans to view its details, such as the title, artist, and duration. If you wish to save a songBeans as a favorite, simply tap the "Save" button while viewing its details. To revisit your saved favorites, navigate to the "Favorite Songs" section available in the main menu.
